overview:
Marco Anatriello is a co-founder, Partner and a Member of the Board of BlueGem Capital Partners.

Marco Anatriello is a Board Member of Olicar, The Private Clinic, Fintyre, Liberty, Neomobile and Enotria.

Prior to partnering with Marco Capello and Emilio Di Spiezio Sardo to launch BlueGem, Marco Anatriello worked at Merrill Lynch for three years in the Italian Investment Banking team in Milan and in the Strategic Solution Group in London. In the Italian Investment Banking team, Marco worked on several mergers & acquisitions, equity and debt transactions, while in the Strategic Solution Group Marco gained exposure to fixed-income derivatives and equity/debt-linked products.
